TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SubscriptionClient extends Microsoft.ServiceBus.Messaging.ClientEntity

Docs.summary: Represents the anchor class used in run-time operations related to a topic subscription.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Abandon (Guid lockToken);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon(valuetype System.Guid lockToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The lock token bound to the locked message instance to abandon.
Docs.summary: Discards the message and relinquishes the message lock ownership.
Docs.remarks: When the client fails to get the message from the queue/topic, this method should be called. Service Bus will increment the delivery count of the message. The client now can either attempt to receive the message again or move it to the dead-letter queue.
Docs.exception: Thrown if the operation exceeded the timeout value set via .
Thrown if the client entity has been closed or aborted.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Abandon (Guid lockToken, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,object> propertiesToModify);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Abandon(valuetype System.Guid lockToken, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> propertiesToModify) cil managed

Docs.param: The lock token bound to the locked message instance to abandon.
A collection of property objects to be modified.
Docs.summary: Discards the message and relinquishes the message lock ownership.
Docs.remarks: When the client fails to get the message from the queue/topic, this method should be called. Service Bus will increment the delivery count of the message. The client now can either attempt to receive the message again or move it to the dead-letter queue.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Complete (Guid lockToken);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Complete(valuetype System.Guid lockToken) cil managed

Docs.param: The lock token bound to the locked message instance.
Docs.summary: Completes processing of a message.
Docs.remarks: This method is used as a handshake between the client and Service Bus for a guaranteed delivery of the message. If the client failed before calling this method, the message will be kept in the queue.
Docs.exception: Thrown if the operation exceeded the timeout value set by .
Thrown if the client entity has been closed or aborted.
Thrown if the message represented by has lost the message lock.

Docs.summary: Asynchronously completes processing of a message.
Docs.returns: A task instance that represents the asynchronous complete operation.
